articles.description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio commentary as Arsenal host Manchester United in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Arsenal vs Manchester United - build-up, team news, live text & radio commentary

articles.description: Emiliano Buendia and Ollie Watkins both score as high-flying Aston Villa end their long wait for a St James' Park victory against Newcastle United.
articles.title: Newcastle 0-2 Aston Villa: Emiliano Buendia and Ollie Watkins end St James' wait for visitors

articles.description: Estevao Willian inspires a Chelsea side missing the injured Cole Palmer to a comfortable win at Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Crystal Palace 1-3 Chelsea: Estevao Willian inspires visitors to comfortable win

articles.description: Novak Djokovic moves through to the Australian Open quarter-finals as fourth-round opponent Jakub Mensik pulls out with an abdominal injury.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Novak Djokovic into last eight as Jakub Mensik withdraws with injury

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text coverage of Hearts v Celtic and Rangers v Dundee in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Sunday's Scottish Premiership - Hearts v Celtic & Rangers v Dundee - radio & text

articles.description: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk says he wants Andy Robertson, who is a target for Tottenham, to stay at the club as he remains a "very important" member of the squad.
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk wants 'very important' Andy Robertson to stay at Liverpool

articles.description: Paddy Pimblett is not short of options for his return to fighting despite his loss to Justin Gaethje at UFC 324.
articles.title: UFC: What next for Paddy Pimblett and who could he fight next?

articles.description: Khadija Shaw strikes late on as Manchester City beat London City Lionesses to move nine points clear at the top of the Women's Super League.
articles.title: London City 1-2 Man City: Khadija Shaw winner sends leaders nine points clear

articles.description: Perth Scorchers extend their record as the most successful men's Big Bash League franchise, beating Sydney Sixers by six wickets to win their sixth title.
articles.title: Big Bash League 2025-26 results: Perth Scorchers crush Sydney Sixers to win sixth BBL title

articles.description: See who BBC Sport's panel of experts have picked out to make Super Bowl 60 from Sunday's Championship games, and make your selections.
articles.title: NFL play-off predictions: Wwho will make Super Bowl?
